award_title: Evolution and Mechanisms of Thermotolerance in Cyanobacteria
subject: One link instead of 10 troubleshooting emails
body:
Multi-omics pipelines have a short shelf life. Dependencies break, students can't reproduce the environment, collaborators want to apply your model but get stuck on setup.

Built Ouro so methods become reusable infrastructureâ€”one durable link instead of scattered scripts and support emails.

Quick call after the holidays?

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
